title: Gem.
review:
I have seen this movie nearly 1 year ago, it was great but I knew that there are lot of things which I've missed, now that I have seen it so carefully, I can clearly say that this movie gives the best feels ever.
I have seen movies of 15+ languages but never came across such beautiful stuff.
Hats of to the creator Makoto Shinkai, it's so so so good that I can't even resist myself to write a review on ImDB.

title: ENDGAME > ROLLERCOASTER
review: Look it is the best movie I've ever saw in my life. Plz watch only in theatres.
